title: Track One Expense Today
content: Write down one purchase you make today and ask yourself: Was this necessary? This simple habit builds awareness of your spending patterns.

title: Practice the 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding Technique
content: Notice 5 things you can see, 4 things you can touch, 3 things you can hear, 2 things you can smell, and 1 thing you can taste. Perfect for reducing financial anxiety.

title: Update Your LinkedIn Headline
content: Spend 5 minutes crafting a compelling LinkedIn headline that reflects your current goals. Small career investments compound over time.

title: Calculate Your Daily Coffee Cost
content: Multiply your daily coffee expense by 365. This isn't about giving up coffee, but understanding the annual impact of small daily expenses.

title: Practice Gratitude for Your Progress
content: List three financial or personal achievements from this year, no matter how small. Recognizing progress builds momentum for future goals.

title: Research One New Skill
content: Spend 10 minutes researching a skill that could advance your career. Knowledge is the best investment you can make in yourself.

title: Set Up One Automatic Transfer
content: Automate a R50 weekly transfer to a separate savings account. Small, consistent actions create significant long-term results.
